text:
@GOPChairwoman @realDonaldTrump The 40 million people who lost their jobs because of #COVID19 would probably deny it. Sure, 1/8 of them just went back to work, but with the surge in cases and states starting to shut down again, how many of them will stay at work this week?

trump is the JOB LOSS president!!
